heading: SVG Generator Form
content: This information will be used for generating SVGs.
descriptionPlaceholder: Example: "A floral pattern with roses and lilies" or "A cartoon character in a superhero costume"
colorSchemeTooltip: Select or Describe the Color Themes
additionalElementsPlaceholder: Example: "Include a sun in the background", "Add text saying 'Happy Birthday'"
additionalElementsTooltip: Any additional elements or specific details to include
usageContextPlaceholder: Example: "For a birthday card", "For a T-shirt design"
usageContextTooltip: Purpose or context of the SVG used to tailor the output
resolutionTooltip: Select or Describe the desired resolution
noOfElementsPlaceholder: Example: "Three butterflies in a single SVG"
noOfElementsTooltip: Number of specific elements within the SVG
